document_data.name: Immerdusk
document_data.mainbody: '''Immerdusk''' was a noble house of [[Cormyr]]. It was based in [[Arabel]].
document_data.History:
The Immerdusks supported [[Gondegal]] when he tried to usurp the kingdom in [[1352 DR]].

During the [[Abraxus affair]], the Immerdusks (like many noble families with country estates) favored [[Vangerdahast]] as regent instead of a ruling noble council if King [[Azoun IV]] died.
document_data.Members:
* [[Casplar Hundyl Immerdusk]], bastard son of King [[Baerovus Obarskyr I|Baerovus Obarskyr]] and founder of the Immerdusk family
* [[Storm Silverhand]], [[Marchion]]ess Immerdusk, ennobled by King Baerovus for adopting Casplar<ref>
